input.sentences: we decided to go out to the bars for halloween and we saw this dog dressed up in human clothes .
at the bar so many different people were dressed in costume .
i had one friend go as a devil and another dressed as a skeleton .
the bar from outside was lit up well and looked like a great time .
towards the end of the night we saw a man walking around in nothing but his underwear .
output.sentences: Why is it that humans love to get dressed up for Halloween?
All the people at this party were dressed up in costume.
My friend dressed up as a skeleton.
We had a great time and we all were lit and I'm sure we looked it too.
We all had a lot to drink but not as much as the guy walking into the night without his underwear.
